attributes.action: AMMEND THE CURRENT TAXATION RULE BY: - INCREASING THE ANNUAL TAX FREE MONETARY GIFT ALLOWANCE  FOR PARENTS GIVING TO THEIR CHILDREN (FROM CURRENTLY A TOTAL OF £3000 P.A.-TO A MININUM  OF £3000 PER CHILD P.A.) THIS ANNUAL GIFT PROVISION TO BE (AS CURRENT) FREE FROM ALL INHERITANCE TAX.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This proposed change is considered a fairer means of distributing family wealth than that which currently exists.
A planned family gift provision is seen as the most sensible means of providing for a childs future.
By increasing the current gift allowance from each parent to apply to each child.
This change is considered to be a much fairer solution to the growing  concerns that Parents currently have with regard to the adverse effects that Inheritance Tax will impose on their Children in the event of their death.
